title: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug  Russie & Hamilton
author: Donscards

posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug  Russie & Hamilton
posts.post_content: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug---I had 2 requests for Russie & Hamilton---Russie is very nice does have a crease upper right---Hamilton has a solid crease top--Russie $2000----Hamilton $1000---I will send these 2 to SGC if they dont sell--I purchased a large collection of Mayo's---I will be using SGC to grade most---I sent in 18 yesterday and will be mailing in more in coming weeks----I take paypal (gift) or checks---Any questions, let me know--thanks, Don
